Package Cmp3\System

Cross Media Publishing - CMP3 www.cross-media.net

Class summary

SystemType
System_t3 This gives access to the system.
tx_cmp3 This static class gives global access to the current system.
System_standalone This gives access to the system.
Exception System exception
ExecException Exception which might be thrown by Exec
System_t3be This gives access to the TYPO3 system in backend context which might be an module.
System_t3fe This gives access to the TYPO3 TSFE system.
